Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: cookiekay
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my daughter, rather than the high priced iphone.  She loves it and says it's just as good.thanks so much. good shipping time, good price.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Phone!
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: My brother has the regular version of this phone and I just got the white one. This phone is fantastic. I love the interface and I love Virgin Mobile! I highly recommend buying this phone

Reviews.Title: USED PHONE, NOT SEALED, NO OWNERS MANUAL...BEWARE!!
Reviews.Author: D. seales "St. Joe Mo"
Reviews.Content: This is a USED phone!!  And it will not activate, no owners annual included as specified and false advertising not saying clearly that you will get a used phone in unsealed box and no owners manual!BEWARE!!

Reviews.Title: This phone does not work properly
Reviews.Author: Diana Briscoe
Reviews.Content: This phone does not call out or take calls without dropping the calls. When I do talk on the phone it is crackley. After only a few minutes use the phone heats up and is hot to the touch. I am unable to download anything. I think this phone was a refurb sold as a new phone. When I received it, the phone was not in a Virgin Mobile box and there was no Users manual. I just wasted my money and time. I have made numerous calls to Virgin Mobile trying to get this phone to work properly.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Tonnie Walker
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be any happier...everything it said it would be and more...thanks for giving me a great phone when i needed it for an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent upgrade
Reviews.Author: Magic Mike
Reviews.Content: Upgraded from the older model LG Optimus, this one is better in every way. Speed, storage, screen size, camera resolution, etc. I love the look of the white case. Very happy with this buy.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Angela N.
Reviews.Content: was for my husband. it came fast. he loves it. would deal with them again. it was also packaged really good

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Luke Talmage
Reviews.Content: I was wary based on other reviews, but this phone has done alright by me.  It was a little touchy and a little tough to get it up and running, something about the network connection.  But after doing some online swapping by me, and a pleasant conversation with customer service things were up and going quickly.  As previously google play was slow to get going (I remember that from my previous smart phone) but once it connected we were rolling quickly.  As with any phone there is a little learning curve and figuring out the subtleties and how things operate.  I've added many apps and widgets quickly I love the Accuweather display clock and I've really removed a lot of the embedded apps  from the display screens.  But that was a personal choice and I'm not holding against the company.  It makes a call quickly and effectively and I love being able to quickly sync with my Google contacts, long gone are the days of tedious entry (unless you have a Grandma phone).  I'm happy this is a great phone.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: tania rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my sister her birthday was Sept.29 today is Oct 9 and the phone don't work I though the battery might have been bad so I bought another one and no its this dam phone now its just sitting in the junk drawer $90.00 Down  the toilet.

Reviews.Title: It's practical
Reviews.Author: Jessica Fortson
Reviews.Content: This phone does the basics of what I needed it for, however it is extremely slow at times and it randomly deletes applications.

Reviews.Title: no charge
Reviews.Author: Rosemarie
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my fiancée....we waited a week for it. And he was so excited to get it today. But we can't get the phone to charge at all. I wonder what happens now that I bought a crappy phone.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Disappointed in Voice Quality
Reviews.Author: rmckim
Reviews.Content: If your present NON smart phone has only 1 or 2 bars, this phone will not be voice serviceable to you.  My 4 year old Samsung Mantra flipphone had only 1 or 2 bars and worked extremely well.  Activating this LG resulted in reception & performance so poor that I reactivated the Samsung again. Since the LG is 4 years newer I figured that it HAD to have at least the same or better performance. Not so. At least with smartphones, it seems that you do get what you pay for. This was a surprising learning experience for me. In fact, I'm quite surprised that VM sells it for their network... They do not offer the same signal strength as the Sprint network does, even though VM is owned by Sprint and broadcasts from Sprint towers. The reason is that Sprint costs more and so their performance sort of HAS to be better than VM. This I learned from a very candid Sprint sales rep. Of course, your mileage may vary.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jmford
Reviews.Content: i absolutely love this phone. its easy to figure out. its thin and very nice. getting my daughter one as soon as possible

Reviews.Title: This is not a cheap phone so i dont know why people are saying that...
Reviews.Author: Jaizelle Hardy
Reviews.Content: This phone was only a bargain on here compared to the actual price online on the virgin mobile website, the phone is 149.99. So that may be cheap to people who have it to blow like that but i saved up quite a bit to get this phone and so far it was worth it. I ended up getting a deal on it through amazon thank goodness. I was overall impressed with how the phone looks.The face of the phone is sleek and easy to use the touch screen when unlocked. u will need your sd card if u will be transferring apps and contacts from an old phone. This so far is a great phone. Thanks for selling it so cheap! And Brand New!! :D

Reviews.Title: Semi-satisfied
Reviews.Author: Carla Maloney
Reviews.Content: Because I wasn't able to use it/not sim card compatible.  I did like it but it wouldn't work for me.

Reviews.Title: extremely poor baterry in this phone
Reviews.Author: cyndy lewis
Reviews.Content: the battery is extremely poor has an extremely short life.. I have to keep it on the charger at all times as it goes off as the baterry wears down without even using it. I feel I cannot even carry it as the battery goes dead when you really need it in  than 4 hours and less . As far as the size of the phone I like. It is also very hard to find covers for it in stores. I would return it but I have already gotten my contacts and apps set up. Would never by another one. It also has poor coverage in certain areas around me.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Cathy Winterbottom
Reviews.Content: I gave this product 5 stars, was a very good value and does everything that much higher priced phones do. Have already recommended it to many people.

Reviews.Title: Didn't disappoint
Reviews.Author: ivan franco
Reviews.Content: Phone is good. Battery doesn't last very long but overall it's ok. Not the best bit what can you expect for $80

Reviews.Title: phone is good enough
Reviews.Author: knovasmama
Reviews.Content: it does have problems like i cant hang up after talking the other person has to and if i get their voice mail  have to pull the battery out of the phone.it has alot of room for games and apps and stuff.it takes pretty decent pics.

Reviews.Title: Rubish
Reviews.Author: MrRagajungle
Reviews.Content: I got it as a cheap replacement because my patience with sprint had ended.. after having an SII and an HTC it is not worth your $$. The phone sizzled itself to death after trying to download my music from amazon mp3 and required a hard reset. And again and again and again... replacement after replacement the processors died. The phone may be capable of just basic use like dialing or texting, but browsing or keeping a music selection on it are laughable. VM is a GREAT service however, jus don't buy a cheapie phone and you'll be much happier :)

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 2.3.7 Gingerbread operating system
3G speed, Bluetooth compatibility
3.5" color touch screen
microSD card slot
5.0MP digital camera
ProductInfo.Name: LG Optimus Elite Prepaid Android Phone (Virgin Mobile) White
